verses.verse: Thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> "Where is the bill <WH5612> of your mother <WH517>'s divorce, <WH3748> with which I have put her away? <WH7971> or which of my creditors <WH5383> is it to whom I have sold <WH4376> you? <WH5771> Behold, for your iniquities were you sold, <WH4376> and for your transgressions <WH6588> was your mother <WH517> put away. <WH7971>

Why, <WH935> when I came, was there no man? <WH376> when I called, <WH7121> was there none to answer? <WH6030> Is my hand <WH3027> shortened <WH7114> at all, <WH7114> that it can't <WH6304> redeem? or have I no power <WH3581> to deliver? <WH5337> Behold, <WH1606> at my rebuke I dry up <WH2717> the sea, <WH3220> I make <WH7760> the rivers <WH5104> a wilderness: <WH4057> their fish <WH1710> stink, <WH887> because there is no water, <WH4325> and die <WH4191> for thirst. <WH6772>
I clothe <WH3847> the heavens <WH8064> with blackness, <WH6940> and I make <WH7760> sackcloth <WH8242> their covering. <WH3682>"

The Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH136> has given <WH5414> me the tongue <WH3956> of those who are taught, <WH3928> that I may know <WH3045> how to sustain <WH5790> with words <WH1697> him who is weary: <WH3287> he wakens <WH5782> morning <WH1242> by morning, <WH1242> he wakens <WH5782> my ear <WH241> to hear <WH8085> as those who are taught. <WH3928>
The Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> has opened <WH6605> my ear, <WH241> and I was not rebellious, <WH4784> neither turned away <WH5472> backward. <WH268>

I gave <WH5414> my back <WH1460> to the strikers, <WH5221> and my cheeks <WH3895> to those who plucked off <WH4803> the hair; <WH5641> I didn't hide my face <WH6440> from shame <WH3639> and spitting. <WH7536>

For the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> will help <WH5826> me; <WH3637> therefore I have not been confounded: therefore have I set <WH7760> my face <WH6440> like a flint, <WH2496> and I know <WH3045> that I shall not be disappointed. <WH954>
He is near <WH7138> who justifies <WH6663> me; <WH7378> who will bring charges against me? <WH5975> Let us stand up together: <WH3162> who is my adversary? <WH1167> Let him come near to me. <WH5066>

Behold, <WH136> the Lord Yahweh <WH3069> will help <WH5826> me; <WH7561> who is he who shall condemn me? <WH1086> Behold, all they shall wax old as a garment, <WH899> the moth <WH6211> shall eat them up. <WH398>

Who is among you who fears <WH3373> Yahweh, <WH3068> who obeys <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of his servant? <WH5650> He who walks <WH1980> in darkness, <WH2825> and has no light, <WH5051> let him trust <WH982> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and rely <WH8172> on his God. <WH430>

Behold, <WH6919> all you who kindle a fire, <WH784> who adorn yourselves with torches <WH2131> around <WH247> yourselves; <WH3212> walk in the flame <WH217> of your fire, <WH784> and among the brands <WH2131> that you have kindled. <WH1197> You shall have this of my hand; <WH3027> you shall lie down <WH7901> in sorrow. <WH4620>
